channel.title: Client Sprites
channel.description: I just downloaded a client that works for my server, but the sprites are so ugly. So I found a server with good sprties, and dragged them over to the client that works. I also deleted the old gay looking ones. When I log in now the areas where the sprites go is all black, so my question is how can I get my good sprites to show up in the black spaces?

item.title: Client Sprites
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

well the first sprites were lke split up. For example, for the inventory box and all the tabs there would be four different pics, but on the new ones i put in there was one pic of all the put together.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Sprites
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

b b0yz 4:

I just downloaded a client that works for my server, but the sprites are so ugly. So I found a server with good sprties, and dragged them over to the client that works. I also deleted the old gay looking ones. When I log in now the areas where the sprites go is all black, so my question is how can I get my good sprites to show up in the black spaces?

Make sure you’re not missing any sprites, or if any are renamed accidently.

Read full topic
